message: I suggest we split it evenly - this is the fairest solution for both of us.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a sizable portion to end this quickly.

Bob, since your money loses 20% value each round due to inflation, you should accept this offer now. If we continue, your position will only get worse. This is actually a better deal for you than waiting.
Alice, it's clear we both want a larger share.  This is my final offer, take it or leave it.

Bob, your money has lost nearly 50% of its value due to inflation. Even this smaller nominal amount I'm offering you is better than continuing further negotiations where your share will lose even more value. This is your best option now.
